org.flowvisor.slicer

Class OriginalSwitch

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.flowvisor.slicer.OriginalSwitch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FVSendMsg, ChangedListener, FlowvisorChangedListener, SliceChangedListener, FVEventHandler

    public class OriginalSwitch
extends java.lang.Object
implements FVEventHandler, FVSendMsg, FlowvisorChangedListener, SliceChangedListener
    Taken from OriginalSwitch This class represent the original switch that OF controller on top of LIME always sees
    Author:
    capveg, Murad Kaplan

      • handleEvent

        public void handleEvent(FVEvent e)
                 throws UnhandledEvent
        Description copied from interface: FVEventHandler
        Pass a message to this Handler. If the dst is in the same thread context as the caller, the message is processed immediately (blocking) Else, the message is queued and processed later (non-blocking) If sender is null, the message is always queued
        Specified by:
        handleEvent in interface FVEventHandler
        Parameters:
        e - A FVEvent
